languages.text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.
When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.
When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

languages.text: 使用此火焰喷射器攻击异形与恶魔时，所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果提高20点。
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: 使用此火焰喷射器攻击异形与恶魔时，所有攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果提高20点。

languages.text: このフレイマーでゼノやディーモンを攻撃する場合、その攻撃によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}の威力が＋20される。
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: このフレイマーでゼノやディーモンを攻撃する場合、その攻撃によって与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}の威力が＋20される。

languages.text: При атаке, направленной против ксеносов или демонов, интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемого этим огнеметом, увеличивается на 20.
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: При атаке, направленной против ксеносов или демонов, интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемого этим огнеметом, увеличивается на 20.
При атаке, направленной против ксеносов или демонов, интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, накладываемого этим огнеметом, увеличивается на 20.

languages.text: Al atacar a xenos y daemons con este lanzallamas, el poder de la {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} de sus ataques aumenta en +20.
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: Al atacar a xenos y daemons con este lanzallamas, el poder de la {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} de sus ataques aumenta en +20.

languages.text: Bei Angriffen auf Xenos und Dämonen mit diesem Flammenwerfer steigt die durch seine Angriffe verursachte Stärke von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} um +20.
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: Bei Angriffen auf Xenos und Dämonen mit diesem Flammenwerfer, steigt die durch seine Angriffe zugefügte Stärke von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} um +20.

languages.text: Lorsque vous attaquez des xénos et des démons à l'aide de ce lance-flammes, la puissance de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé par ses attaques augmente de +20.
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque vous attaquez des xénos et des démons à l'aide de ce lance-flammes, la puissance de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé par ses attaques augmente de +20.

languages.text: Bu alevsaçan ile zeno ve iblislere saldırıldığında bu saldırıların sebep olduğu {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} etkisinin gücü +20 artar.
languages.original_text: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.
